tasks.title: Initialize Astro Project with Tailwind CSS
tasks.description: Set up the Astro 4.x project structure with Tailwind CSS integration and configure the basic development environment.
tasks.details:
1. Initialize Astro project using `npm create astro@latest` with the following options:
   - Template: empty
   - TypeScript: strict
   - Install dependencies: yes

2. Install and configure Tailwind CSS:
   ```bash
   npx astro add tailwind
   ```

3. Create `tailwind.config.mjs` with custom theme extending colors:
   - emerald-500/600 for primary CTA buttons
   - blue-500/600 for secondary buttons
   - gray-900 (#111827) for footer background
   - Custom gradient stops for hero background

4. Set up `src/styles/global.css` with Tailwind directives and custom CSS for:
   - Button transitions and hover effects
   - FAQ accordion animations
   - Scroll shadow effects for header

5. Configure `astro.config.mjs` with:
   - Site URL: https://translate.pixel-evolve.com
   - Output: static
   - Build options for Cloudflare Pages compatibility

6. Create basic directory structure:
   ```
   src/
   â”œâ”€â”€ layouts/
   â”œâ”€â”€ components/
   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/
   â””â”€â”€ styles/
   public/
   â”œâ”€â”€ favicon.svg
   â””â”€â”€ robots.txt
   ```

7. Add robots.txt with sitemap reference
tasks.testStrategy: Verify: 1) `npm run dev` starts development server without errors, 2) Tailwind classes apply correctly in a test component, 3) Project builds successfully with `npm run build`, 4) Output directory structure matches Astro conventions

tasks.title: Create Base Layout and SEO Configuration
tasks.description: Build the BaseLayout.astro component with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter cards, and JSON-LD structured data.
tasks.details:
1. Create `src/layouts/BaseLayout.astro` with:
   - HTML5 doctype and lang attribute
   - Viewport meta tag for responsive design
   - Character encoding (UTF-8)

2. Implement SEO meta tags:
   ```astro
   <title>Shopify AI Translator - Translate Your Store in Minutes | PixelEvolve</title>
   <meta name="description" content="AI-powered translation app for Shopify..." />
   <meta name="keywords" content="Shopify translation, AI translation..." />
   <link rel="canonical" href="https://translate.pixel-evolve.com/" />
   ```

3. Add Open Graph tags:
   - og:title, og:description, og:image (1200x630), og:url, og:type

4. Add Twitter Card meta tags:
   - twitter:card (summary_large_image)

5. Implement JSON-LD structured data for SoftwareApplication schema with:
   - name, applicationCategory, operatingSystem
   - offers array for Free ($0), Basic ($19), Pro ($49) plans
   - author (PixelEvolve AB organization)

6. Include global styles and fonts
7. Add favicon link
8. Create props interface for dynamic page titles and descriptions
tasks.testStrategy: Validate: 1) All meta tags render correctly in page source, 2) JSON-LD validates using Google's Rich Results Test, 3) Open Graph preview works using Facebook Sharing Debugger or similar tool, 4) Layout accepts and renders slot content properly

tasks.title: Performance Optimization and Cloudflare Deployment
tasks.description: Optimize assets, run Lighthouse audits, configure Cloudflare Pages deployment, and set up custom domain.
tasks.details:
1. Performance optimizations:
   - Ensure all images are optimized (WebP format where possible)
   - Add loading="lazy" to below-fold images
   - Minimize JavaScript bundle size
   - Verify CSS is tree-shaken properly by Tailwind

2. Run Lighthouse audit:
   - Target scores: Performance > 90, Accessibility > 90, Best Practices > 90, SEO > 90
   - Fix any identified issues

3. Accessibility check:
   - Ensure proper heading hierarchy (h1 â†’ h2 â†’ h3)
   - Add aria-labels where needed
   - Test keyboard navigation
   - Verify color contrast ratios

4. Build and verify production output:
   ```bash
   npm run build
   npm run preview
   ```

5. Configure for Cloudflare Pages:
   - Build command: `npm run build`
   - Build output directory: `dist`
   - Node.js version: 18+

6. Deployment steps:
   - Push code to GitHub repository
   - Connect repo to Cloudflare Pages
   - Configure custom domain: translate.pixel-evolve.com
   - Verify SSL certificate is active

7. Post-deployment verification:
   - Test all pages on production
   - Verify meta tags with social sharing debuggers
   - Check sitemap.xml is accessible
   - Test on multiple devices and browsers
tasks.testStrategy: Validate: 1) Lighthouse scores meet targets, 2) Build completes without errors, 3) Preview server works correctly, 4) Cloudflare deployment succeeds, 5) Custom domain resolves, 6) SSL certificate is valid, 7) All features work in production
